The size class an be used change the size of an element of a section of the page.

Colors

The light and dark variants are automatically generated from the color-primary, color-secondary, and color-tertiary LESS variables.

light

primary

dark

light

secondary

dark

light

tertiary

dark

All of the colors can be used in the styling attribute i.e. styling="bg-raspberry text-paper-light"

Age when awarded

33.5 Years

Hey young gun!

The average age of a Physics Laureate is 58 years.

Birthday Month

February

A rare month. Most Physics Laureates are born in April.

Topiary

Beard

Whoa there! The average Physics Laureate is clean shaven.

Country of Birth

Top 8%

Sweden has a total of 12 Physics Laureates.

Recent Awards

12%

Sweden has been awarded the 12% of all Physics awards in the last 25 years. That's higher than the average of 8%.
